page.title: 12SNABLEAZES FARM.
page.content: {Snableazes}gets its strange name from the snow which blows over the hill in winter.The farm is rented by Mr Gray who has lived here 25 years.He rents 306 acres which is all flat.He has 60 acres of grass land,39 of oil seed rape,33 of winter barley,30 of winter wheat,12 of peas and the rest is spring barley,which is the only crop {he doesn't rotate.}He usually harvests in August and the rest of his work is dependant on the weather.In the{Autumn {he buys in beef cattle}which live outside in the Winter to help fertilise the fallow land.{He sells {them again in the Spring}before planting.He works the land by himself with only one worker and no contractors.He has a lot of modern machinery including a 4 wheel drive,100h.p.tractor.His only modern buildings are 2 200 ton{corn bins.
